items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Command-style button with EXEC, OUTLINE, GHOST, and DANGER variants. Supports SM and MD sizes.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Status indicator badge with ACTIVE, SCANNING, WARNING, CRITICAL, and OFFLINE variants.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Inline alert block with STATUS, WARNING, CRITICAL, and INFO variants. Includes icon prefix.

items.name: panel
items.title: Panel
items.description: Container with optional corner-notch clip-path. Composes PanelHeader, PanelContent, and PanelFooter.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: Animated loading indicator with SM, MD, and LG sizes. Optional text label.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Horizontal or vertical rule with optional centered label.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Linear progress bar built on Radix UI. Green fill with optional label and percentage display.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: Toggle checkbox built on Radix UI. Green checked state with optional label.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: Toggle switch built on Radix UI. Slides between off (amber) and on (green) states.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: Text input with optional label, prefix symbol, and inline error message.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Multi-line text field with optional label and inline error message.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Dropdown selector built on Radix UI. Supports groups, labels, and separators.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: Modal dialog built on Radix UI. Backdrop blur overlay with green-accented header.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: Tabbed panel built on Radix UI. Active tab highlighted with green underline.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: Contextual label built on Radix UI. Fade + zoom animation. Requires TooltipProvider.

items.name: toast
items.title: Toast
items.description: Non-blocking notification built on Radix UI. Four semantic variants. Managed via useToast hook.
